00017 enum _IHexDefinitions {
00018         /* 768 should be plenty of space to read in a Intel HEX8 record */
00019         IHEX_RECORD_BUFF_SIZE = 768,
00020         /* Offsets and lengths of various fields in an Intel HEX8 record */
00021         IHEX_COUNT_OFFSET = 1,
00022         IHEX_COUNT_LEN = 2,
00023         IHEX_ADDRESS_OFFSET = 3,
00024         IHEX_ADDRESS_LEN = 4,
00025         IHEX_TYPE_OFFSET = 7,
00026         IHEX_TYPE_LEN = 2,
00027         IHEX_DATA_OFFSET = 9,
00028         IHEX_CHECKSUM_LEN = 2,
00029         IHEX_MAX_DATA_LEN = 512,
00030         /* Ascii hex encoded length of a single byte */
00031         IHEX_ASCII_HEX_BYTE_LEN = 2,
00032         /* Start code offset and value */
00033         IHEX_START_CODE_OFFSET = 0,
00034         IHEX_START_CODE = ':',
00035 };
